about_the_game:
True Abstraction Plus is remake of predecessor of True Abstraction: Rewind with extended content.

Point of TA+ is to show how this concept looked like at the beginning, but with good graphics.

Original "True Abstraction" was only a gamejam project made in 5 days on engine we didn't have experience with.
But we loved the idea so much, it evolved into True Abstraction: Rewind.
detailed_description:
True Abstraction Plus is remake of predecessor of True Abstraction: Rewind with extended content.

Point of TA+ is to show how this concept looked like at the beginning, but with good graphics.

Original "True Abstraction" was only a gamejam project made in 5 days on engine we didn't have experience with.
But we loved the idea so much, it evolved into True Abstraction: Rewind.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04
  • Processor: Intel core i5 3570
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760
  • Additional Notes: It is recommended to install on a SSD but HDD should still work.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04
  • Processor: Intel Core i9 11900k
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 Ti
  • Additional Notes: It is recommended to install on a SSD but HDD should still work.

name: True Abstraction Plus

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel core i5 3570
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: It is recommended to install on a SSD but HDD should still work.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i9 11900k
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 Ti
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: It is recommended to install on a SSD but HDD should still work.

short_description: True Abstraction Plus - remaked predecessor of True Abstraction: Rewind with extended content.
supported_languages:
English*, Polish
*languages with full audio support
